stimulusHtml: Which of the following values of  mat  can be used to show that the method does not work as intended?

features.html:
Consider the following method, which is intended to return  true  if  0  is found in its two-dimensional array parameter  mat  and  false  otherwise. The method does not work as intended.

 

public static boolean findZero(int[][] mat) 
{ 
   for (int row = 0; row <= mat.length; row++) 
   {
      for (int col = 0; col < mat[0].length; col++) 
      { 
         if (mat[row][col] == 0) 
         { 
            return true; 
         } 
      } 
   }
   return false; 
}
